resources.string: "Ukuze kunwetshwe impilo yebhethri, i-Adaptive Battery ikhawulela ibhethri kuzinhlelo zokusebenza ezingasetshenziswa kakhulu. Ithebhulethi yakho izofunda ukuthi uzisebenzisa kanjani izinhlelo zokusebenza ngesikhathi.\n\nIzaziso zingabambezeleka kulezi zinhlelo zokusebenza."

"Ukuze kunwetshwe impilo yebhethri, i-Adaptive Battery ikhawulela ibhethri kuzinhlelo zokusebenza ezingasetshenziswa kakhulu. Idivayisi yakho izofunda ukuthi uzisebenzisa kanjani izinhlelo zokusebenza ngesikhathi.\n\nIzaziso zingabambezeleka kulezi zinhlelo zokusebenza."
